metadata.synopsis: Laezel reaction for the Gith Chokepoint meeting
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays after dealing with the Gith at the chokepoint

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.context: NodeContext: Seething but not too much.

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: You did well to intervene, vexed as I am to admit it. The Jhe'stil Kith'rak would have flayed our skin and left our carcasses to burn in the sun -

94.speaker: Lae'zel
94.text: - all for the sake of the artefact that we carry.

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: - all for the sake of this polyhedric 'weapon'.

101.speaker: Lae'zel
101.text: I required your silence, and you made me a mockery!

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: A kith'rak demanded my head. He'd deny me a cure.

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.text: Bah - this is a distraction. The kith'rak deserves the whole of my scorn.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel pauses, then turns her anger to the knight that flew offNodeContext: Lae'zel pauses, then turns her anger to the knight that flew off

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: How dare he speak my queen's name!  How dare he dishonour her child!
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is over the top mad. She should be visually raging here.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Wasn't he acting on your queen's command?

100.speaker: Lae'zel
100.text: Do not be naive. I. Followed. Protocol. I've earned Vlaakith's favour.

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.text: Shka'keth! Keep your hands off me.

89.speaker: Lae'zel
89.text: I will remove the parasite. I will see the kith'rak dead, and present his corpse to Vlaakith herself.

60.speaker: Lae'zel
60.text: Show me pity again, and I will present your corpse instead.

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.text: The crèche is near, this much we know. We follow the path forward and into the valley.

36.speaker: Lae'zel
36.text: A crèche is near, that much is certain. We follow the path forward and seek signs of githyanki settlers.

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.text: No one, not even the ignoble Jhe'stil Kith'rak, will keep me from my purification.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Given how badly that went, what do you plan to do next?
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

104.speaker: Lae'zel
104.text: I will remove the parasite. I will see the kith'rak dead, and present his head to Vlaakith herself.

51.speaker: Lae'zel
51.text: And I will leave behind this wretched realm to stand at my queen's right hand.

58.speaker: Player
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

52.speaker: Lae'zel
52.text: Then we will see the queen's justice done.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: The kith'rak was following Vlaakith's orders.
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Calm yourself - save your anger for your queen's enemies.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Calm yourself - save your anger for your queen's enemies.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

84.speaker: Lae'zel
84.text: Yes. Judicious counsel - and vexing, given the source.
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

108.speaker: Lae'zel
108.text: Yes. Judicious counsel - and vexing, given the source.
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

107.speaker: Lae'zel
107.text: I am a child of Gith. l will abide by protocol and seek the crèche ghustil, as Vlaakith has taught.
107.context: NodeContext: VARSH = as it is spelled

97.speaker: Lae'zel
97.text: And then - then I will skewer the heretic with his own silver sword.

21.text: Tas'ki! My rage is endless, I assure you.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel remains angry.NodeContext: TAH-ski. Remains angry.

61.speaker: Lae'zel
61.text: Tas'ki! My rage is endless, I assure you.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel remains angry.NodeContext: TAH-ski. Remains angry.

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: I will remove the parasite. I will see the kith'rak dead.

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.text: And I will offer his head to Vlaakith herself.

80.speaker: Lae'zel
80.text: A kith'rak demanded my head. I should have given him yours.

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *Your skull trembles; your parasite wriggles. Lae'zel sees your memories of your confrontation with Kith'rak Voss.*
28.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

67.speaker: Lae'zel
67.text: Voss! Jhe'stil Kith'rak - knight supreme. An honourable warrior - Vlaakith's finest!
67.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: I am impressed. He wanted your head, yet it remains firmly atop your shoulders.
42.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

6.speaker: Lae'zel
6.text: A lesser person would be adorning the road as a shredded corpse.
6.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: 'Impressive?' That's the nicest thing you've ever said to me.
79.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

90.speaker: Lae'zel
90.text: If by 'nice' you mean 'truthful', then consider me positively pleasant.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Aren't you upset that I killed your fellow gith?
73.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: Why should I mourn a sarth who failed Jhe'stil Kith'rak's orders?
14.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

105.speaker: Lae'zel
105.text: Now, to the point: Voss revealed the crèche's location. We must go there immediately.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: Now, to the point: The crèche is not far from where you met Voss. We must go there immediately.

56.speaker: Lae'zel
56.text: Unless, of course, you'd rather sprout waxy tendrils where there were no tendrils before.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: And if Kith'rak Voss finds us before then?

45.speaker: Lae'zel
45.text: Keep me at your side, and I will invoke protocol. It is my people's duty to aid infected githyanki.

35.speaker: Lae'zel
35.text: Had I been travelling with you, we might have avoided the knight's fury.

57.speaker: Lae'zel
57.text: Now, to the point: The crèche cannot be far from where you met Voss. We must go there immediately.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: We should go to the crèche as soon as possible.

87.speaker: Lae'zel
87.text: Lead, then. Take us to our cure.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: The knight seeks a 'weapon'. It's the artefact that we carry.

69.speaker: Lae'zel
69.text: As I'd expect. Ancient githyanki symbols adorn the artefact's face.

86.speaker: Lae'zel
86.text: We can deliver it to a kith'rak or varsh at the first opportunity.

29.speaker: Lae'zel
29.text: The crèche is not far from where you met Voss. We must go there at immediately.

53.speaker: Lae'zel
53.text: The crèche cannot be far from where you met Voss. We must go there immediately.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.text: He would have made a valuable ally. Instead, he watches from the skies like a falcon - and we are his prey.

71.speaker: Lae'zel
71.text: Tsk'va - an unexpected complication. I am vexed. And moreso, impressed.

30.speaker: Lae'zel
30.text: Yet your head remains firmly atop your shoulders.

96.speaker: Lae'zel
96.text: He'd have led us right to the crèche. Instead, he watches from the skies like a falcon - and we are his prey.

68.speaker: Lae'zel
68.context: NodeContext: Seething but not too much.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.text: Voss dishonours protocol. He dishonours the regent queen Vlaakith. He dishonours me.
39.context: NodeContext: Seething but not too much.

43.speaker: Lae'zel
43.text: Protocol Two-thousand-ten: 'No kith'rak shall intentionally harm Vlaakith's faithful in the course of a hunt.'

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Cool off and show me some respect or we're done here.

46.speaker: Lae'zel
46.text: You want my respect? Earn it.

102.speaker: Lae'zel
102.text: A kith'rak demanded my head. He'd deny me a cure.

37.speaker: Lae'zel
37.text: The kith'rak is consumed by his hunt. He'd have taken my life, given the chance.

62.speaker: Lae'zel
62.text: And yet you say nothing. You should rage at this heresy, and scream for his head!

75.speaker: Lae'zel
75.text: How dare he speak my queen's name!  How dare he dishonour her child!

78.speaker: Player
78.text: You are right to be angry. The kith'rak is a danger.

8.speaker: Lae'zel
8.text: He demanded our heads. He'd deny us a cure.

64.speaker: Lae'zel
64.text: This accursed weapon has distorted his loyalty. He'd sever our heads, given the chance.

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.text: The kith'rak demands the fugitives' heads. I should have given him yours.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: What the hells happened back there with the dragon-rider?

98.speaker: Lae'zel
98.text: The kith'rak is consumed by his hunt. He'd have taken my head, given the chance.
